basics.name: Lily Enanoria
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science on the Security Science track in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

education.area: Computer Science, Security Science track (expected Spring, 2026)

highlights: Regulated and ensured the success of weddings with 150+ guests with staff of 2 to 4 people
Communicated with vendors to establish smooth execution and proactively avoid possible risks
Sole member who can translate and communicate with Japanese customers
Worked events of 500+ people with a limited staff of 3 to 4 people

awards.title: Hawai'i Seal of Biliteracy, Japanese and English
awards.summary: Awarded upon graduation to students who demonstrate a high proficiency in English and at least one additional language.
